title: Bug 18915[Preferences] switching between erroneous preferences pages should generate error, not warning.
OB: When entering invalid data on a preference page, the UI highlights the issue by displaying a red flag. If the user tries to select another page without fixing the problem, a warning dialog is shown, stating 'The currently displayed page contains invalid values.'
EB: The warning dialog should be an 'error' dialog instead, as it is not allowed to leave the page without fixing the mistake.
SR: To reproduce the issue, enter invalid data on any preference page and observe the red flag in the UI. Then, try to select another page without fixing the problem and note the warning dialog that appears.
